policyMetadata.title: Privacy Policy
policyMetadata.subtitle: Welcome to RentFlow360. We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information.
policyMetadata.consentNotice: By using RentFlow360, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to this Privacy Policy. If you do not agree with any part of this policy, please discontinue use of our Services immediately.

dataCollectionCategories.title: Personal and Account Information
items: Date of birth (for identity verification and screening purposes)
Employment information and income verification documents

dataCollectionCategories.title: Property and Lease Information
items: Property ownership documentation and management authorization
Lease agreements, terms, and rental payment schedules
Insurance enrollment status and policy details

dataCollectionCategories.title: Financial Information
items: Bank account information (for ACH payments and disbursements)
Payment card information (securely processed via our payment partners)
dataCollectionCategories.note: Payment card data is handled by PCI-DSS compliant processors (Stripe, Plaid) and is not stored directly on our servers.

dataCollectionCategories.title: Tenant Screening and Credit Data
dataCollectionCategories.intro: With your explicit consent, we collect and process:
dataCollectionCategories.additionalInfo: Screening Partners: TransUnion SmartMove, Experian Connect, CoreLogic SafeRent, Equifax Tenant Screening

dataCollectionCategories.title: Technical and Usage Data
items: Platform usage analytics and feature engagement
Security audit logs and access records

dataCollectionCategories.title: Communication Data
items: Messages between users within the platform
Email and SMS communications (processed via SendGrid and Twilio)
Phone call recordings (when announced and with consent)

platformModules.name: Property Management Module
platformModules.dataUsed: Property details, unit information, lease agreements, occupancy records, maintenance requests, vendor contacts, inspection reports
useCases: Registering and cataloging properties and individual units
Tracking lease terms, renewal dates, and occupancy status
Managing and routing maintenance requests to appropriate vendors
Scheduling and documenting property inspections
Coordinating move-in/move-out processes
Generating lease documents and amendments

platformModules.name: Tenant Screening Module
platformModules.dataUsed: Full name, date of birth, SSN (encrypted), addresses, employment information, income documentation, rental history, credit reports, criminal background checks
useCases: Conducting FCRA-compliant background and credit checks through authorized bureaus
Verifying employment status and income sufficiency
Reviewing rental history and previous landlord references
Assessing creditworthiness and payment reliability
Generating risk scores and screening reports for property managers

platformModules.name: Rent Collection Module
platformModules.dataUsed: Bank account information, payment card details, lease payment schedules, transaction history, late payment records, payment preferences
useCases: Automating monthly rent invoicing based on lease terms
Processing ACH, card, and digital wallet payments securely
Sending payment reminders and overdue notices
Reconciling payments with ledger accounts
Generating receipts and payment confirmations

platformModules.name: Utility Management Module
platformModules.dataUsed: Utility account numbers, meter readings, usage data, billing rates, payment allocations, tenant responsibility agreements
useCases: Integrating with utility meters for automated reading collection
Tracking electricity, water, gas, and other utility consumption
Calculating individual tenant charges based on usage or allocation formulas
Generating utility invoices and adding charges to rent statements

platformModules.name: Renters Insurance Module
platformModules.dataUsed: Policy numbers, insurance provider details, coverage amounts, policy effective dates, renewal dates, proof of insurance documents
useCases: Enrolling tenants in renters insurance programs
Verifying active insurance coverage and adequate liability limits
Tracking policy status and expiration dates
Sending renewal reminders before policy lapses

platformModules.name: Analytics & Reporting Module
platformModules.dataUsed: All platform data (aggregated and anonymized where possible)
useCases: Creating KPI dashboards showing property performance metrics
Analyzing occupancy trends, turnover rates, and vacancy periods
Tracking financial performance, revenue, and expense patterns
Generating predictive insights for rent optimization

legalBases.title: Contractual Necessity
legalBases.description: Processing required to fulfill lease agreements, payment obligations, and service delivery.

legalBases.title: Legal Compliance
legalBases.description: Processing mandated by FCRA, RCW 59.18, E-SIGN Act, tax laws, and other applicable regulations.

legalBases.title: Legitimate Interests
legalBases.description: Improving our Services, ensuring platform security, preventing fraud, and conducting business analytics (balanced against your privacy rights).

legalBases.title: Consent
legalBases.description: Processing that requires your explicit permission, such as background checks, marketing communications, and optional data sharing. You may withdraw consent at any time through your account settings.

technical.name: Secure Authentication
technical.description: Multi-factor authentication (MFA) and single sign-on (SSO) options

technical.name: Access Controls
technical.description: Role-based permissions and principle of least privilege

technical.name: Network Security
technical.description: Firewalls, intrusion detection systems, and DDoS protection

operational: Regular security audits and vulnerability assessments
Penetration testing by third-party security firms
Incident response and breach notification procedures
Employee security training and background checks
Secure development practices and code reviews
payment: No storage of full card numbers on our servers

privacyRights.title: Access and Portability
rights: Request access to your personal information
Receive a copy of your data in a commonly used format
Obtain copies of credit reports or screening results

privacyRights.title: Correction and Accuracy
rights: Update your account details and preferences

privacyRights.title: Deletion
rights: Request deletion of your personal information (subject to legal exceptions)

cookieTypes.name: Essential Cookies
cookieTypes.description: Required for platform operation, authentication, and security. These cannot be disabled without affecting core functionality.

cookieTypes.name: Functional Cookies
cookieTypes.description: Remember your preferences, settings, and session information to improve usability.

cookieTypes.name: Analytics Cookies
cookieTypes.description: Help us understand how users interact with our Services, identify popular features, and detect issues.

cookieTypes.name: Performance Cookies
cookieTypes.description: Monitor system performance, load times, and technical metrics.

scope.intro: This Privacy Policy applies to all users of {companyName}, including:

geographicCoverage.title: Geographic Coverage
geographicCoverage.content: This policy primarily applies to users located in the United States, with initial operations focused on Washington State (including Seattle, Bellevue, Tacoma, and Spokane).

regulatoryCompliance.title: Regulatory Compliance
items: Electronic Signatures in Global and National Commerce Act (E-SIGN Act, 15 U.S.C. ยง 7001)
Applicable federal and state data protection and financial regulations

legal.intro: We process your personal information based on the following legal grounds:

sharing.noSellNotice: We do not sell, rent, or trade your personal information to third parties for their marketing purposes.
sharing.intro: We may share limited information in the following circumstances:

subsections.title: Service Providers and Business Partners
subsections.content: We share data with trusted third-party vendors who assist in delivering our Services:

subsections.title: Credit Bureaus and Screening Agencies
subsections.content: With your written consent, we share applicant information with consumer reporting agencies for credit reports, rental history verification, and background screening.

subsections.title: Property Owners and Managers
subsections.content: Tenant information is shared with authorized property owners and managers as necessary for lease application evaluation, rent collection, maintenance coordination, and lease enforcement.

subsections.title: Legal and Regulatory Authorities
subsections.content: We may disclose information when required by law or to comply with court orders, subpoenas, legal processes, government requests, enforce our Terms of Service, investigate fraud, or protect the safety of users.

security.intro: We implement comprehensive security controls to protect your information:
security.limitation: While we employ industry-leading security measures, no system can guarantee absolute security. We cannot fully eliminate risks such as unauthorized access, hardware failures, or sophisticated cyberattacks. You should also take precautions to protect your account credentials.

retention.intro: We retain your information only as long as necessary for legitimate business, legal, and operational purposes:

activeAccounts.title: Active Accounts and Leases
activeAccounts.content: Data is retained throughout the duration of active leases and account relationships, plus a reasonable period after termination to fulfill obligations.

inactiveAccounts.title: Inactive Accounts
inactiveAccounts.content: Accounts inactive for more than {inactiveAccountThreshold} may be archived or deleted after appropriate notice, except where retention is required by law.

rights.intro: Subject to applicable law and verification of your identity, you have the following rights:

exerciseRights.title: How to Exercise Your Rights

steps.label: Include
steps.content: Your full name, email address, and description of your request

steps.label: Verification
steps.content: We may require additional information to verify your identity

exerciseRights.responseTime: We will respond to verified requests within {responseTime}, or as required by applicable law.

cookies.intro: {companyName} uses cookies, web beacons, and similar technologies to enhance functionality and analyze usage.
cookies.choicesContent: You can manage cookie preferences through your browser settings, our cookie consent banner, or account privacy settings.

thirdParty.intro: Our platform may contain links to third-party websites, services, or resources (such as insurance provider portals, payment processors, or utility company sites).

warning.title: Important:
warning.content: We are not responsible for the privacy practices, content, or security of third-party services. We encourage you to review their privacy policies before providing any personal information.

children.intro: {companyName} is intended for users 18 years of age or older. We do not knowingly collect, maintain, or use personal information from individuals under 18.
children.discovery: If we discover that we have inadvertently collected information from a minor, we will promptly delete it from our records.
children.contact: If you believe a minor has provided information to us, please contact us immediately at {contactEmail}.

changes.intro: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically to reflect changes in our Services, business practices, new legal or regulatory requirements, enhanced security measures, or user feedback.

material.title: Material Changes
material.content: For significant changes affecting your rights, we will provide prominent notice through email, in-platform announcements, and updated effective date.

nonMaterial.title: Non-Material Changes
nonMaterial.content: Minor updates and clarifications will be posted with an updated "Last Reviewed" date.

changes.continuedUse: Continued use of our Services after changes take effect constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.

contact.intro: For questions, concerns, or requests regarding this Privacy Policy or your personal data:

washington.title: Washington State Residents
washington.content: Under the Washington My Health My Data Act and other state laws, Washington residents may have additional rights regarding their personal information. Please contact us to exercise these rights.

california.title: California Residents (Future Expansion)
california.content: When we expand operations to California, residents will have rights under the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA) and California Privacy Rights Act (CPRA).

other.title: Other States
other.content: As additional state privacy laws take effect, we will update this section accordingly.

footer.thankYou: Thank you for trusting {companyName} with your personal information.
footer.commitment: We are committed to protecting your privacy while delivering exceptional property management services.

compliance.title: Compliance Statement
compliance.intro: {companyName} is committed to full compliance with:
compliance.outro: We conduct regular compliance audits and update our practices as regulations evolve.
